app.name: cannafriend
app.installPWADesc: Install Cannafriend on your device for quick access

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.introDesc: We value your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect and how we use it.
privacy.collectionDesc: We may collect account information, plant data you enter, and technical analytics (device, browser, usage).
privacy.usageDesc: We use your data to operate the app, improve features, and provide support. We do not sell your data.
privacy.sharingDesc: We only share data with service providers required to run the app (e.g., hosting, analytics) under strict confidentiality.
privacy.securityDesc: We apply industry-standard measures to protect your data, but no system is 100% secure.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies/local storage for authentication, preferences and performance.
privacy.advertisingDesc: If applicable, ads may be shown. We aim to minimize tracking and respect your preferences.
privacy.rightsDesc: You can access, update or delete your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this policy. Weâ€™ll post changes with an updated date.

terms.title: Terms
terms.acceptanceDesc: By using the app you agree to these terms and policies.
terms.useDesc: Do not misuse the app, attempt unauthorized access, or break laws.
terms.accountDesc: You are responsible for your account and keeping credentials confidential.
terms.privacyDesc: See our Privacy Policy for how we handle your data.
terms.terminationDesc: We may suspend or terminate access for violations or misuse.
terms.changesDesc: We may update these terms. Continued use means acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.contactDesc: For questions about these terms, email nachthelad.dev@gmail.com

landing.hero: Your Complete Cannabis Growing Companion - Track, manage, and optimize your plants with powerful tools designed specifically for cannabis cultivation.
landing.whyChooseDesc: The most complete and easy-to-use growing tool

benefits.easyToUseDesc: Intuitive interface for growers of all levels
benefits.completelyPrivateDesc: Your data stays secure and private
benefits.betterResultsDesc: Optimize your grow with accurate data

settings.title: Settings
settings.accountDesc: Manage your account information and session
settings.accountDeletedDesc: Your account and data were removed

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to browse, you accept their use.

premium.title: Premium required
premium.analyzeDesc: This feature requires a premium subscription. Upgrade your account to access the AI assistant.
premium.mercadoPago: We are working on MercadoPago integration to offer you the best payment experience.
